title: Battlestar Galactica
brief_description: When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fabled 13th colony, Earth.

constellations_other.name: Arcades and AI
constellations_other.description: Using the godfather of computing, Alan Turing, as a starting point, this Constellation traces the evolution of AI representation on-screen and the way female androids, robots and holograms have been hyper sexualised.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.
